findSessions.title: Tim buoi choi
findSessions.description: Xem cac buoi choi phu hop voi lich cua ban. Sang, chieu, hay toi ‚Äî chung toi co het.

bookInstantly.title: Dat ngay
bookInstantly.description: Giu cho trong vai giay. Thanh toan truc tuyen bang the hoac chuyen khoan. Khong phien phuc.

beyondCourt.title: Khong chi la san bong
beyondCourt.description: Giao luu hang thang, giai dau va hop mat sau tran. Hon ca mot cau lac bo.

mascot.title: Gap go Loafy
mascot.description: Linh vat corgi cua chung toi the hien tinh than cau lac bo ‚Äî than thien, vui ve, va luon san sang choi.

ctaSection.title: San sang choi?
ctaSection.description: Tran dau tiep theo chi cach mot cu nhan chuot. Tham gia cong dong va bat dau dat buoi choi ngay.

footer.tagline: Pickleball o Ha Noi, don gian hon.
